level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • level.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Platform>

    public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Platform>
    A single level of a platformer Game.
    Author:
    James Talbert

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int height
      The height of the level, specified explicitly in the file.
      int width
      The width of the level, specified explicitly in the file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(java.lang.String fileName)
      Loads the level file as a new Level, using the level.platforms.Platform class to parse the individual tokens.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <PlatformType> 
      PlatformType[]      		 getAll(java.lang.Class<PlatformType> type)
      Gets an array (typed by the given class, no casting necessary) of all platforms in the level with the given type (type.isInstance(platform) returns true).
      java.util.Iterator<Platform> iterator() 
      void updateLevel(long milliseconds)
      Updates the entire level, platform-by-platform.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • width

        public int width
        The width of the level, specified explicitly in the file.

      • height

        public int height
        The height of the level, specified explicitly in the file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Level

        public Level(java.lang.String fileName)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the level file as a new Level, using the level.platforms.Platform class to parse the individual tokens.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the path the the level file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file could not be found or if the file did not specify a width and height.

    • Method Detail

      • updateLevel

        public void updateLevel(long milliseconds)
        Updates the entire level, platform-by-platform.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - the time since the last update.
        See Also:
        Platform.update(long, Level), Game#update(long)

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Platform> iterator()
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Platform>

      • getAll

        public <PlatformType> PlatformType[] getAll(java.lang.Class<PlatformType> type)
        Gets an array (typed by the given class, no casting necessary) of all platforms in the level with the given type (type.isInstance(platform) returns true). Subclasses of the given type are included.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of platforms to include in the output array.
        Returns:
        an array of the matching platforms.
